dmca.title: Mir Internet Marketing Claims Copyright Infringement (#39)
dmca.body:
Mir Internet Marketing, Inc.
[Private]
Chicago, Illinois 60607
March 02, 2004

Google, Inc.
Attn: Customer Support, DMCA Complaints
[Private]
Mountain View, CA 94043

Dear Google Customer Support Professionals,

1.	The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on http://www.seologic.com/contact.php
 
	Search Query: "guide you through the planning process, delivering information" http://www.google.com/search?hl=en&lr=&ie=UTF-8&oe=UTF-8&q=%22guide+you+through+the+planning+process%2C+delivering+information%22

Infringing Web Pages: http://www.seotopranks.com/enquiry.htm

2. 	My Contact Information: [Private]@internetmadeeasy.com

3.	Infringer's Contact Information:
SEOTOPRANKS, INC
Tel: XXX XXX XXXX
Fax: XXX XXX XXXX
Email: [Private]@seotopranks.com

4.	I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent or the law.

5.	I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner of am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Sincerely,

[Private], CEO
Mir Internet Marketing, Inc.
P. (XXX) XXX-XXXX
e. [Private]@intemetmadeeasy.com
